This page provides you a step-by-step to get started with korus

= Checkout korus =
Use an SVN client 
{{{
  $ svn checkout http://korus.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ korus-read-only
}}}

= build =
{{{
 $ cd build
 $ ./ant.sh clean
 $ ./ant.sh recompile
 $ ./ant.sh jar
}}}
